data.actual_result: It shows a dot and you can’t view the message
data.expected_result: It shouldn’t show a dot to signify a message
data.short_description: When you go into a channel you can’t read the messages but you can send them and there is pins, you see a dot for the pins
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a Buddy  - Have your buddy make a server - Have your buddy prohibit you from seeing messages in general but let you message - Go into another discord server and wait for your buddy to write a message and pin it - Try to view the pins
